sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import profileImg from './assets/1696350470649.png'; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState(''); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); setSubmitStatus(''); try { const response = await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL}/api/contact`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }); if (response.ok) { setSubmitStatus('success'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); } else { setSubmitStatus('error'); } } catch (error) { setSubmitStatus('error'); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; const projects = [ { title: "Period Tracker Website", description: "A menstrual tracking web app built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Includes features like cycle logging, symptom tracking, and an AI chatbot named Luna for user support. Designed with a clean UI and responsive layout for accessibility.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1461749280684-dccba630e2f6", github: "https://github.com/MG14-3/portfolio-website", demo: "https://ecommerce-demo.com", technologies: ["React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "Express"] }, { title: "Personal Portfolio Website", description: "A responsive personal portfolio to showcase projects, skills, and experience. Built with React and styled using Material UI. Includes dynamic project cards, GitHub integration, and mobile-friendly design.", image: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/577585/pexels-photo-577585.jpeg", github: "https://github.com/MG14-3/portfolio-website", demo: "", technologies: ["React18", "Tailwind CSS", "FastAPI", "AWS"] }, { title: "Secure Kubernetes Cluster with Istio and OPA Gatekeeper", description: "A college-level DevOps project demonstrating security in Kubernetes using Istio service mesh and OPA Gatekeeper for policy enforcement. Focuses on authentication, authorization, and observability in a microservices environment.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1607799279861-4dd421887fb3", github: "https://github.com/MG14-3/istio-opa-k8s-security", demo: "https://weather-dashboard-demo.com", technologies: ["Kubernetes", "Istio", "OPA Gatekeeper", "YAML", "Helm"] } ]; return (

About Me

BTech CSE Student | Passionate Developer & Tech Enthusiast | VIT’27

Hi, I’m Mangalam — a Computer Science undergraduate passionate about building impactful tech solutions. I specialize in full-stack development with experience in React, Node.js, Python, and MongoDB. I enjoy turning ideas into real applications, whether through collaborative projects, hackathons, or internships. Clean code, intuitive design, and performance optimization are at the heart of my development approach.

I’m also diving deeper into backend systems, DevOps practices, and cloud platforms like AWS to streamline deployment and scale applications efficiently. My goal is to become a well-rounded software engineer who can contribute across the stack while solving meaningful problems. When I’m not coding, I love exploring automation tools, learning new frameworks, or helping peers navigate their own tech journeys.
